messages.subject: Re Help I need reassurance
messages.msgSnippet: Sandra I dont *make* my dd do the work books.  I do have 2 lying around - i math and one english - I like her to do a page of math per week - but dont force it
messages.messageBody:
Sandra
I dont *make* my dd do the work books. I do have 2 lying around - i
math and one english - I like her to do a page of math per week - but
dont force it - the books are there if she WANTS to do them. I also
have a folder with *fun* things and *brain* things that are there if
she wants them. We have lots of games from scrabble to snakes and
ladders. Paints - celetape - pen and penciles - boxes and cartons of
all sizes - knitting wool - key board - guitar - computer games -
science kit - baking ingredients - you name it....

To you all. Thankyou for your help - and thank you to those who have
children like mine!!!!!
Marianne
